page.title: 05BASILDON NE: CHILD'S VIEW
page.content:
This area needs more Adventure parks. And more trees and flowers because lots of them are vandalised. We also need more clubs nearby like Karate and Riding Schools. We also need more libraries so there can be a library for adults and a library for children.
But I am lucky. I think that I have a good area and we have good neighbours next to our house. It is normally very quiet and we have a slide out the front, and a couple of trees and some grass so it's very good.
But some people spoil things like writing all over the slide and walls and places and by leaving litter like paper and empty cans and shopping trolleys. Adults do this as much as older children.
